timestamps.label: Download timestamps
timestamps.tooltip: This downloads a csv file, which includes the inserted timestamps for all the vessels that have been reported in this login environment.

search.label: Search in table
search.tooltip: This enables table search containing for Timestamp, Classifier Code, Event Type Code, Port From, Port To and Next Port

length.max: The vessel name should be maximal 100 characters long
length.min: The vessel name should be at least 1 character long

max.number: The maximal number of TEU is 32767
